name: RTCConfiguration.bundlePolicy
description: The RTCConfiguration dictionary's bundlePolicy property is a string value indicating which SDP bundling policy, if any, to use for the underlying RTP streams used by an RTCPeerConnection.

refs.name: WebRTC 1.0: Real-time Communication Between Browsers
refs.description: The definition of 'RTCConfiguration.bundlePolicy' in the 'WebRTC 1.0: Real-time Communication Between Browsers' specification.
